fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use one whale and select three targets, and learn how many of them are evil.
- Use two whales to deal a Basic attack to a target. You can use one extra whale to make this attack Unstoppable and prevention immune.
- Use three whales to create a massive whirlpool. Select three targets, and each of them will be redirected to themselves. If you use this ability twice in the same night, all evil players will be redirected to themselves.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn whales at the start of each even night. The amount of whales you earn is equal to half of the number of which night it's currently.
- You can use any of your abilities multiple times, but you can only use 2 abilities total each night.
